virality_potential.justification: Reply to another user with a promotional NFT listing; limited audience and low shareability beyond the original poster.

informative_value.justification: Personal update about a single NFT listing; no factual news or broader context.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Expresses gratitude and excitement about the painting and listing.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevance tied to the sale of a specific NFT; likely to fade once sold or listing expires.

virality_potential.justification: Promotional call-to-action with multiple crypto hashtags; may resonate within niche crypto community but unlikely to go mainstream.

informative_value.justification: No substantive information provided; just a hype tweet.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Enthusiastic and positive tone encouraging participation.

duration_of_impact.justification: Interest may persist for a few weeks as the token or game gains traction.

virality_potential.justification: Generic hashtagged link with no context; low chance of widespread sharing.

informative_value.justification: Link may contain info, but tweet itself offers no details; minimal informational content.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral tone with no emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Short-lived relevance tied to the linked content; likely to fade quickly.

virality_potential.justification: Link to a news article about crypto projects; could be shared by crypto enthusiasts.

informative_value.justification: Provides detailed overview of upcoming crypto asset projects; high informational value.

duration_of_impact.justification: Article covers evergreen crypto market trends; relevance may last months.

virality_potential.justification: Personal trading update with limited audience; unlikely to spread widely.

informative_value.justification: Shares a trading decision; no broader market insight.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevance tied to short-term trading activity; fades quickly.
